Name: Red Conquer
About the game: after re-landing on an alien planet, and turning a base on it, you meet resistance, apparently someone decided to seize this planet with you too, break resistance plans and do not allow re-penetration to the planet. In the role of the commander of a new link in the war, you set off together with a platoon of soldiers to recapture the planet, gain a foothold here and fight back the resistance before the reinforcement arrives peculiarities Music from Ciloka Graphics from Joiky1
